name: Raea
description:
Classic 16bit RPG with table top inspiration.

100% RPG Maker MV RTP.  Only exception - 4 player characters were created with built in character generator.

Chapter two is completed and includes:
-Over 3 hours of gameplay
-Redone loot/experience system
-Multiple crafting systems (alchemy, scribe, & cooking)
-Unlockable achievements known as "Titles"
-Set team of 4 with linear upgradeable classes and abilities
-Tournament system for 1 on 1 combat and experience

Created this to learn RPG Maker MV.  Originally released 2 years ago and was used to encourage Toasty Time to start doing First Impression videos (it was his first):

Game is unfinished.


***Bonus Content***

0 Plugins included/used
